snippet: Britain's Andy Murray beat Argentina's Juan Martin del Potro 7-5 4-6 6-2 7-5 in a compelling Olympic tennis final on Sunday to become the first player to win two men's singles gold medals....
lead_paragraph: Britain's Andy Murray beat Argentina's Juan Martin del Potro 7-5 4-6 6-2 7-5 in a compelling Olympic tennis final on Sunday to become the first player to win two men's singles gold medals.

headline.print_headline: Murray Outlasts Del Potro to Land Gold
headline.main: Murray Outlasts Del Potro to Land Gold
